text: When Ron Baron was starting an investment business, he got some advice from Steve Wynn. The casino magnate told Baron to name his investment company after himself as a way to show clients and customers that he promised to stand behind it.

title: Tesla Stock Is Up 67% in 2023. Here's Why That's Not So Impressive.
text: Tesla is mainly up so much this year because it sold off so heavily in December 2022. Understanding a stock's price action can help you determine if its gain or loss makes sense.

title: Tesla No Longer Deserves A Premium
text: Tesla, Inc. stock has always traded at a premium, which was (at least) partly justified by superior growth and margins. But recently, Tesla's operational metrics have deteriorated and aren't much better than the industry average anymore. Moreover, now is not the time to pay top dollar for the promise of future earnings from AI-related projects.

title: King Charles highlights risks as AI safety summit gets underway
text: King Charles III highlighted the profound impact of artificial intelligence (AI) in his opening address to the UK's first Safety Summit at Bletchley Park, comparing it to historical milestones such as the harnessing of electricity, the splitting of the atom, and the discovery of fire. The King described AI as "one of the greatest technological leaps in the history of human endeavour" but emphasised the need to address its associated risks, much like the global effort to combat climate change.

title: This one stock could potentially undo the 2023 rebound if it falls another 10% as one analyst expects
text: Can the S&P 500 index and Nasdaq Composite hold on to their 2023 gains if Nvidia Corp. falls? It's a question that's cropping up more and more these days.

title: EPS Season: Unveiling the 3 Biggest Winners
text: Better-than-expected earnings reports often spark up trends. Stock Strategist Andrew Rocco unveils 3 of the season's biggest winners.

title: Toyota Earnings May Show a Flaw in Tesla's Pricing Strategy
text: Toyota reported strong third-quarter operating profit. It's now a leader among peers.

title: Subaru follows Toyota in adopting Tesla's charging standard
text: Subaru wants in on Tesla's Superchargers. On Wednesday, the Japanese automaker said its future electric vehicles will adopt Tesla's charging port starting in 2025.

title: UAW Strike Is Coming To An End; Is Tesla Next To Organize?
text: The UAW strike, which began Sept. 15, appears to be pumping the brakes.

title: Why Tesla Stock Drove Into a Ditch in October
text: Tesla posted solid results for the third quarter, but CEO Elon Musk sounded a cautious tone on the post-earnings call. The company is facing economic and engineering headwinds that are eating into margins.
